Class CacheRegistry

java.lang.Object

public class CacheRegistry
extends java.lang.Object

Cache registry keeps all registered caches.

registerCache

public static <C extends java.lang.Comparable<? super C>> void registerCache(java.lang.String name,
                                                                              cache,
                                                                             java.lang.Class<C> codeType)
Registers a cache with a name. If another cache with the same name exists, then a RuntimeException will be thrown.

Type Parameters:
C - Cache code type.
Parameters:
name - Cache name.
cache - Cache to register.
codeType - Type of Cache code.
